name: chow mein
description: Stir-fried noodles in Chinese, is a dish of stir-fried wheat noodles, often served with proteins, vegetables, and a savory sauce.

name: Momo
description: Steamed, filled dumplings popular in Tibetan and Nepali cuisine, often served with a spicy sauce called achar, and can also be found in soup or fried versions.

name: Paratha
description: Paratha is a popular unleavened, flatbread originating from the Indian subcontinent, typically made from whole wheat flour.

name: Mutton Rice
description: Mutton rice, also known as mutton pulao or lamb pulao, is a flavorful rice dish featuring tender mutton cooked with aromatic spices and fragrant basmati rice.

name: French Fries
description: French fries are a popular snack or side dish made from deep-fried, batonnet or julienne-cut potatoes, typically seasoned with salt and served hot.

name: Mutton Curry
description: Tender pieces of mutton simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

name: Thali
description: Indian meal consisting of a variety of small dishes served on a large, circular plate, offering a diverse range of flavors and textures.

name: chicken Tandoori
description: Tandoori chicken is a popular Indian dish featuring chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then roasted in a tandoor (a cylindrical clay oven) for a smoky, tender, and flavorful result.

name: Chicken Briyani
description: Chicken biryani is a flavorful, fragrant rice dish originating from the Indian subcontinent, featuring layers of spiced, tender chicken and fluffy basmati rice, often garnished with fried onions and herbs.

name: Chicken Lollipop
description: A frenched chicken drumette is marinated and then batter fried or baked until crisp.

name: Rajma Masala
description: Rajma Masala- kidney beans curry with onion, tomatoes and spices.

name: Alu Puri
description: Deep-fried Indian bread made with boiled potatoes, flour, and spices.
